name: Le pays d'Adibou
summary: Here we go, on a journey to the Land of Adiboo! Explore the magical garden and grow some fruit and vegetables yourself, but also enjoy nature at the same time. You can of course bake a delicious cake with that beautiful fruit, but you can also choose to do crafts in Adiboo's house. Or just have fun in the wonder cave and the games paradise. You need a good dose of common sense, courage and a sense of adventure to complete the games successfully. Get ready for hours of exciting gaming fun with your favorite heroes!
